body:
## Vigenère Ciphering Algorithm

Simple Vigenère Ciphering algorithm uses ASCII English charset range...

### Vigenère?! What?!

The Vigenère cipher is a method of encrypting alphabetic text by using a series of different Caesar ciphers based on the letters of a keyword. It is a simple form of polyalphabetic substitution.

It uses key elimination and constraint methods for encrypting and decrypting. Heavily borrowed from Caesar cipher. 

![Key constraints](http://celebi.me/blog/wp-content/uploads/2009/07/vigenere-tablosu.gif)

For more information visit [here...](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vigenère_cipher)
name: Vigenere
